import React, { useState } from "react"; const defaultFormFields={ displayName:'', email:'', password:'', confirmPassword:'', } const SignUpForm = () => { const [formFields,setFormFields]=useState(defaultFormFields) const {displayName,email,password,confirmPassword}=formFields const handleChange=(event)=>{ const {name}=event } const submitHandler=()=>{ } return (

) } export default SignUpForm
